static cmv0(POINTS, LENGTH1)[source]

“Check if there exists at least one set of consecutive data points that are a distance greater than LENGTH1 apart.

Parameters

  • POINTS (float) – 2Darray containing the coordinates of data points.

  • LENGTH1 (float) – Float length greater than or equal to 0

Returns

True if one set of consecutive data points are found that fulfills the requirement.

Return type

bool

static cmv5(NUMPOINTS, POINTS)[source]

Checking if there are at least one set of consecutive data points where Xj - Xi < 0.

Parameters

  • NUMPOINTS (int) – Number of data points.

  • POINTS (float) – 2Darray containing the coordinates of data points.

Returns

True if condition Xj - Xi < 0 is satisfied, otherwise return False.

Return type

bool
